name: Flight of the Kader
description:
Years ago the Kovogs of planet Blorg created the airship Kader to protect their homeworld. A thousand years has passed since the airship had seen use, that is until the savage eyeballs of planet Klorg attacked. Now it is up to you, a lone Kovog to pilot Kader and defeat the alien menace!

Controls:

  • WASD -> Movement
  • E -> Interact
  • ScrollUp/ScrollDown -> Increase/Decrease Grenade Launcher power
